override void OnInitialized ()
override async Task OnAfterRenderAsync (bool firstRender)
Detailed Description
This class is an exception to the naming convention, "don't use the word 'Luthetus' in class names".
Reason for this exception: when one first starts interacting with this project, this type might be one of the first types they interact with. So, the redundancy of namespace and type containing 'Luthetus' feels reasonable here.
